p: THP-1 cells were seeded in six-well plates at a density of 2.5 × 105 cell/ml. THP-1 cells were differentiated to macrophages with PMA (100 ng/ml) and vitamin D3 (0.1 μM). Twenty-four hours after cell differentiation, cells were treated for 72 h with 0–250 μg/ml of IH and SO extract in a fresh serum-free medium in both the absence and presence of LPS (1 μg/ml). Nitrite determinations were done in 50 µl aliquots of sample mixed with 200 µl of the Griess reagent [ 14, 15].
